ironsword.name: Iron Sword
ironsword.desc: A standard sword made of iron─ simple, but effective.

silversword.name: Silver Sword
silversword.desc: An exceptional sword of rare metals.

armorslayer.name: Armorslayer
armorslayer.desc: A sword made to penetrate heavy armor. Effective: Armored.

killingedge.name: Killing Edge
killingedge.desc: A sword especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds.

levinsword.name: Levin Sword
levinsword.desc: A magical sword that can strike close or at range.

wodao.name: Wo Dao
wodao.desc: A sword honed to a razor edge.

wyrmslayer.name: Wyrmslayer
wyrmslayer.desc: A sword crafted specifically to fight dragons. Effective: Dragon.

bravesword.name: Brave Sword
bravesword.desc: A sword built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

liberation.name: Libération
liberation.desc: Divine Dragon only. Fills engage meter by 1 when user attacks and defeats a foe in a single turn.

willeglanz.name: Wille Glanz
willeglanz.desc: Divine Dragon only. A powerful sword that can strike close or at range.

caladbolg.name: Caladbolg
caladbolg.desc: A legendary sword, famous for its great power.

ironblade.name: Iron Blade
ironblade.desc: A massive sword that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

steelblade.name: Steel Blade
steelblade.desc: A massive sword of steel that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

silverblade.name: Silver Blade
silverblade.desc: A massive sword of rare metals that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

georgios.name: Georgios
georgios.desc: A legendary blade that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

folkvangr.name: Fólkvangr
folkvangr.desc: Sword of Alfonse, prince of Askr. Grants Atk+3 for 1 turn if user has 50% HP or less at start of turn.

ironlance.name: Iron Lance
ironlance.desc: A standard lance made of iron─ simple, but effective.

silverlance.name: Silver Lance
silverlance.desc: An exceptional lance of rare metals.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.desc: A light throwing lance that can strike close or at range.

ridersbane.name: Ridersbane
ridersbane.desc: A lance designed for foes on horseback. Effective: Cavalry.

killerlance.name: Killer Lance
killerlance.desc: A lance especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds.

flamelance.name: Flame Lance
flamelance.desc: A magical lance that can strike close or at range.

spear.name: Spear
spear.desc: A powerful throwing lance that can strike close or at range.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: A lance built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

bravelancesigurd.name: Brave Lance (Sigurd)
bravelancesigurd.desc: Lance wielded by Emblem Sigurd. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

ridersbanesigurd.name: Ridersbane (Sigurd)
ridersbanesigurd.desc: Lance wielded by Emblem Sigurd. Effective: Cavalry.

brionac.name: Brionac
brionac.desc: A powerful lance of legend. Can strike close or at range.

irongreatlance.name: Iron Greatlance
irongreatlance.desc: A massive lance that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

steelgreatlance.name: Steel Greatlance
steelgreatlance.desc: A massive lance of steel that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

silvergreatlance.name: Silver Greatlance
silvergreatlance.desc: A massive lance of rare metals that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

venomous.name: Venomous
venomous.desc: A lance of legend that smashes and poisons hit foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

fensalir.name: Fensalir
fensalir.desc: Lance of Sharena, princess of Askr. Inflicts Atk-2 for 1 turn on adjacent foes at the start of player phase.

ironaxe.name: Iron Axe
ironaxe.desc: A standard axe made of iron─ simple, but effective.

silveraxe.name: Silver Axe
silveraxe.desc: An exceptional axe of rare metals.

handaxe.name: Hand Axe
handaxe.desc: A light throwing axe that can strike close or at range.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.desc: A war hammer made to crack through heavy armor. Effective: Armored.

hammerike.name: Hammer (Ike)
hammerike.desc: Hammer of Emblem Ike. Smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat. Eff: Armored.

poleaxe.name: Poleaxe
poleaxe.desc: An axe whose long handle helps reach mounted foes. Effective: Cavalry.

killeraxe.name: Killer Axe
killeraxe.desc: An axe especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds.

killeraxeleif.name: Killer Axe (Leif)
killeraxeleif.desc: Axe wielded by Emblem Leif. Easily inflicts fatal wounds.

tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
tomahawk.desc: A powerful throwing axe that can strike close or at range.

braveaxe.name: Brave Axe
braveaxe.desc: An axe built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

irongreataxe.name: Iron Greataxe
irongreataxe.desc: A massive axe that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

steelgreataxe.name: Steel Greataxe
steelgreataxe.desc: A massive axe of steel that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

silvergreataxe.name: Silver Greataxe
silvergreataxe.desc: A massive axe of rare metals that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

hurricaneaxe.name: Hurricane Axe
hurricaneaxe.desc: A magical axe that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat. Effective: Flying.

ukonvasara.name: Ukonvasara
ukonvasara.desc: A huge, legendary axe that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

noatun.name: Nóatún
noatun.desc: Axe of Anna, a commander in Askr. Grants Mov+1 for 1 turn when user has 40% HP or less at start of turn.

minibow.name: Mini Bow
minibow.desc: An easy-to-use, short-range bow. Effective: Flying.

ironbow.name: Iron Bow
ironbow.desc: A standard bow made of iron. Effective: Flying.

steelbow.name: Steel Bow
steelbow.desc: A bow made of steel. Effective: Flying.

silverbow.name: Silver Bow
silverbow.desc: An exceptional bow of rare metals. Effective: Flying.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.desc: A bow made to fire at longer ranges. Effective: Flying.

killerbow.name: Killer Bow
killerbow.desc: A bow especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds. Effective: Flying.

killerbowlyn.name: Killer Bow (Lyn)
killerbowlyn.desc: Bow wielded by Emblem Lyn. Easily inflicts fatal wounds. Effective: Flying.

radiantbow.name: Radiant Bow
radiantbow.desc: A magical bow whose arrows pierce with light. Effective: Flying.

bravebow.name: Brave Bow
bravebow.desc: A bow built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. Effective: Flying.

lendabair.name: Lendabair
lendabair.desc: A bow wielded by legends. Effective: Flying.

shortknife.name: Short Knife
shortknife.desc: An easy-to-use throwing knife. Poisons hit foes.

irondagger.name: Iron Dagger
irondagger.desc: A standard throwing knife. Poisons hit foes.

steeldagger.name: Steel Dagger
steeldagger.desc: A throwing knife made of steel. Poisons hit foes.

silverdagger.name: Silver Dagger
silverdagger.desc: A throwing knife made of rare metals. Poisons hit foes.

kard.name: Kard
kard.desc: A fighting knife intended for close combat. Poisons hit foes.

stiletto.name: Stiletto
stiletto.desc: A fighting knife intended for close combat. Poisons hit foes.

peshkatz.name: Peshkatz
peshkatz.desc: A fighting knife intended for close combat. Poisons hit foes.

misericorde.name: Misericorde
misericorde.desc: Veyle only. An enchanted throwing knife that inflicts magic damage and poisons hit foes.

cinquedea.name: Cinquedea
cinquedea.desc: A legendary throwing knife that poisons hit foes.

carnwenhan.name: Carnwenhan
carnwenhan.desc: A legendary short sword. Smashes and poisons hit foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

surge.name: Surge
surge.desc: A basic attack tome that can only be used in close combat.

fire.name: Fire
fire.desc: A standard tome of fire magic.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: A standard tome of thunder magic. Cannot follow up.

wind.name: Wind
wind.desc: A standard tome of wind magic. Effective: Flying.

elsurge.name: Elsurge
elsurge.desc: An advanced attack tome that can only be used in close combat.

elthunder.name: Elthunder
elthunder.desc: An advanced thunder tome. Cannot follow up.

elwind.name: Elwind
elwind.desc: An advanced wind tome. Effective: Flying.

thoron.name: Thoron
thoron.desc: A truly mighty thunder tome. Cannot follow up.

excalibur.name: Excalibur
excalibur.desc: A truly mighty wind tome. Effective: Flying.

nova.name: Nova
nova.desc: An extremely potent tome. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

meteor.name: Meteor
meteor.desc: A tome of long-range attack magic. Cannot be used at shorter ranges.

obscurite.name: Obscurité
obscurite.desc: Fell Dragon only. Truly mighty dark magic.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers an ally's HP.

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers a great deal of an ally's HP.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: A staff imbued with healing magic. Can recover an ally's HP at a distance.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers vast amounts of an ally's HP.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers HP for all allies within a 5-space radius.

restore.name: Restore
restore.desc: A staff that removes status effects on an ally.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports an adjacent ally up to 5 spaces away.

rewarp.name: Rewarp
rewarp.desc: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports the user up to 5 spaces away.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports a faraway ally to an adjacent space.

entrap.name: Entrap
entrap.desc: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports a faraway foe to an adjacent space.

illume.name: Illume
illume.desc: A staff that magically shines through darkness. Illuminates a 7-space radius (shrinks one space per turn).

freeze.name: Freeze
freeze.desc: A staff that prevents foes from moving for 1 turn.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: A staff that prevents foes from using tomes or staves for 1 turn.

obstruct.name: Obstruct
obstruct.desc: A staff that conjures a mass of ice that makes one space impassable for 1 turn.

fracture.name: Fracture
fracture.desc: A staff imbued with magic that can break foes.

nodus.name: Nodus
nodus.desc: A staff imbued with mysterious magic that sets all allies' engage meters to max.

initiateart.name: Initiate Art
initiateart.desc: A scroll of a fundamental martial skill. As a basic text, it does not attack twice.

ironbodyart.name: Iron-Body Art
ironbodyart.desc: A scroll of a basic martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

steelhandart.name: Steel-Hand Art
steelhandart.desc: A scroll of a standard martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

silverspiritart.name: Silver-Spirit Art
silverspiritart.desc: A scroll of a highly polished martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

shieldingart.name: Shielding Art
shieldingart.desc: A scroll of a defensive martial skill. Grants Def+5.

flashingfistart.name: Flashing Fist Art
flashingfistart.desc: A scroll of brash martial skill. Grants Spd+5, but user takes +5 damage. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

divinefistart.name: Divine Fist Art
divinefistart.desc: A scroll of a legendary martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

firebreath.name: Fire Breath
firebreath.desc: Strikes foes in area at half Def. Sets area on fire. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.desc: A long-range fire attack. Ignores foe's Def/Res.

fellassault.name: Fell Assault
fellassault.desc: A series of colossal ranged attacks.

fellsurge.name: Fell Surge
fellsurge.desc: A powerful ranged strike of dark magic.

whirlingdeath.name: Whirling Death
whirlingdeath.desc: A spin that brutally strikes an area. Attacks all foes within 3 spaces.

howlingbeam.name: Howling Beam
howlingbeam.desc: A powerful beam of dark magic that leaves a foul miasma in its wake.

disengage.name: Disengage
disengage.desc: Forces all foes to lose engaged status.

flamecannon.name: Flame Cannon
flamecannon.desc: Use to attack all units within a 2-space radius of a target point and set the same area on fire.

antitoxin.name: Antitoxin
antitoxin.desc: Drink to recover 15 HP and cure poison.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Drink to grant Res+7 to user (bonus shrinks by 1 each turn).

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: Burn to illuminate a 7-space radius (shrinks one space per turn).

seraphrobe.name: Seraph Robe
seraphrobe.desc: Expend to grant max HP+5 to user permanently.

energydrop.name: Energy Drop
energydrop.desc: Expend to grant Str+2 to user permanently.

spiritdust.name: Spirit Dust
spiritdust.desc: Expend to grant Mag+2 to user permanently.

secretbook.name: Secret Book
secretbook.desc: Expend to grant Dex+2 to user permanently.

speedwing.name: Speedwing
speedwing.desc: Expend to grant Spd+2 to user permanently.

goddessicon.name: Goddess Icon
goddessicon.desc: Expend to grant Lck+2 to user permanently.

dracoshield.name: Dracoshield
dracoshield.desc: Expend to grant Def+2 to user permanently.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: Expend to grant Res+2 to user permanently.

boots.name: Boots
boots.desc: Expend to grant Mov+1 to user permanently.

novicebook.name: Novice Book
novicebook.desc: Book that teaches basic skills. Grants 100 SP.

adeptbook.name: Adept Book
adeptbook.desc: Book that teaches advanced skills. Grants 500 SP.

expertbook.name: Expert Book
expertbook.desc: Book that unlocks the true secrets of skills. Grants 1,000 SP.

hptonic.name: HP Tonic
hptonic.desc: Drink to grant max HP+5 for the duration of a battle.

strengthtonic.name: Strength Tonic
strengthtonic.desc: Drink to grant Str+2 for the duration of a battle.

dexteritytonic.name: Dexterity Tonic
dexteritytonic.desc: Drink to grant Dex+2 for the duration of a battle.

speedtonic.name: Speed Tonic
speedtonic.desc: Drink to grant Spd+2 for the duration of a battle.

lucktonic.name: Luck Tonic
lucktonic.desc: Drink to grant Lck+2 for the duration of a battle.

defensetonic.name: Defense Tonic
defensetonic.desc: Drink to grant Def+2 for the duration of a battle.

magictonic.name: Magic Tonic
magictonic.desc: Drink to grant Mag+2 for the duration of a battle.

resistancetonic.name: Resistance Tonic
resistancetonic.desc: Drink to grant Res+2 for the duration of a battle.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Expend to change user to an advanced class.

secondseal.name: Second Seal
secondseal.desc: Expend to change user to a different class in the same tier, or to set level in the current class from max to 1.

pactring.name: Pact Ring
pactring.desc: Ring used to increase the support level with one ally from A to S Rank.

timecrystal.name: Time Crystal
timecrystal.desc: The Draconic Time Crystal can briefly reverse the flow of time.

vandersmeal.name: Vander's Meal
vandersmeal.desc: Leftovers tidily packed by Vander. Eat to recover 20 HP.

clannesmeal.name: Clanne's Meal
clannesmeal.desc: Leftovers eagerly packed by Clanne. Eat to recover 20 HP.

frammesmeal.name: Framme's Meal
frammesmeal.desc: Leftovers enthusiastically packed by Framme. Eat to recover 20 HP.

alfredsmeal.name: Alfred's Meal
alfredsmeal.desc: Leftovers fiercely packed by Alfred. Eat to recover 20 HP.

boucheronsmeal.name: Boucheron's Meal
boucheronsmeal.desc: Leftovers idly packed by Boucheron. Eat to recover 20 HP.

etiesmeal.name: Etie's Meal
etiesmeal.desc: Leftovers tightly packed by Etie. Eat to recover 20 HP.

celinesmeal.name: Céline's Meal
celinesmeal.desc: Leftovers elegantly packed by Céline. Eat to recover 20 HP.

louissmeal.name: Louis's Meal
louissmeal.desc: Leftovers helpfully packed by Louis. Eat to recover 20 HP.

chloesmeal.name: Chloé's Meal
chloesmeal.desc: Leftovers motheringly packed by Chloé. Eat to recover 20 HP.

diamantsmeal.name: Diamant's Meal
diamantsmeal.desc: Leftovers flawlessly packed by Diamant. Eat to recover 20 HP.

ambersmeal.name: Amber's Meal
ambersmeal.desc: Leftovers clumsily packed by Amber. Eat to recover 20 HP.

jadesmeal.name: Jade's Meal
jadesmeal.desc: Leftovers cleanly packed by Jade. Eat to recover 20 HP.

alcrystsmeal.name: Alcryst's Meal
alcrystsmeal.desc: Leftovers skillfully packed by Alcryst. Eat to recover 20 HP.

lapissmeal.name: Lapis's Meal
lapissmeal.desc: Leftovers modestly packed by Lapis. Eat to recover 20 HP.

citrinnesmeal.name: Citrinne's Meal
citrinnesmeal.desc: Leftovers lavishly packed by Citrinne. Eat to recover 20 HP.

ivysmeal.name: Ivy's Meal
ivysmeal.desc: Leftovers thoughtfully packed by Ivy. Eat to recover 20 HP.

zelkovsmeal.name: Zelkov's Meal
zelkovsmeal.desc: Leftovers *artfully* packed by Zelkov. Eat to recover 20 HP.

kagetsusmeal.name: Kagetsu's Meal
kagetsusmeal.desc: Leftovers earnestly packed by Kagetsu. Eat to recover 20 HP.

hortensiasmeal.name: Hortensia's Meal
hortensiasmeal.desc: Leftovers haphazardly packed by Hortensia. Eat to recover 20 HP.

rosadosmeal.name: Rosado's Meal
rosadosmeal.desc: Leftovers cutely packed by Rosado. Eat to recover 20 HP.

goldmarysmeal.name: Goldmary's Meal
goldmarysmeal.desc: Leftovers immaculately packed by Goldmary. Eat to recover 20 HP.

timerrasmeal.name: Timerra's Meal
timerrasmeal.desc: Leftovers discordantly packed by Timerra. Eat to recover 20 HP.

merrinsmeal.name: Merrin's Meal
merrinsmeal.desc: Leftovers coolly packed by Merrin. Eat to recover 20 HP.

panettesmeal.name: Panette's Meal
panettesmeal.desc: Leftovers oddly packed by Panette. Eat to recover 20 HP.

fogadosmeal.name: Fogado's Meal
fogadosmeal.desc: Leftovers nonchalantly packed by Fogado. Eat to recover 20 HP.

pandreosmeal.name: Pandreo's Meal
pandreosmeal.desc: Leftovers affably packed by Pandreo. Eat to recover 20 HP.

bunetsmeal.name: Bunet's Meal
bunetsmeal.desc: Leftovers expertly packed by Bunet. Eat to recover 20 HP.

annasmeal.name: Anna's Meal
annasmeal.desc: Leftovers economically packed by Anna. Eat to recover 20 HP.

jeansmeal.name: Jean's Meal
jeansmeal.desc: Leftovers thoroughly packed by Jean. Eat to recover 20 HP.

yunakasmeal.name: Yunaka's Meal
yunakasmeal.desc: Leftovers carefully packed by Yunaka. Eat to recover 20 HP.

seadallsmeal.name: Seadall's Meal
seadallsmeal.desc: Leftovers prophetically packed by Seadall. Eat to recover 20 HP.

lindonsmeal.name: Lindon's Meal
lindonsmeal.desc: Leftovers creatively packed by Lindon. Eat to recover 20 HP.

saphirsmeal.name: Saphir's Meal
saphirsmeal.desc: Leftovers neatly packed by Saphir. Eat to recover 20 HP.

veylesmeal.name: Veyle's Meal
veylesmeal.desc: Leftovers lovingly packed by Veyle. Eat to recover 20 HP.

mauviersmeal.name: Mauvier's Meal
mauviersmeal.desc: Leftovers meticulously packed by Mauvier. Eat to recover 20 HP.

ironingot.name: Iron Ingot
ironingot.desc: A piece of iron used at the smithy and boutique.

steelingot.name: Steel Ingot
steelingot.desc: A piece of steel used at the smithy and boutique.

silveringot.name: Silver Ingot
silveringot.desc: A piece of silver used at the smithy and boutique.

mtcrystal.name: Mt Crystal
mtcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases might (Mt).

critcrystal.name: Crit Crystal
critcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases critical (Crit).

dexcrystal.name: Dex Crystal
dexcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases dexterity (Dex).

spdcrystal.name: Spd Crystal
spdcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases speed (Spd).

defcrystal.name: Def Crystal
defcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases defense (Def).

rescrystal.name: Res Crystal
rescrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases resistance (Res).

hitcrystal.name: Hit Crystal
hitcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases hit rate.

avocrystal.name: Avo Crystal
avocrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases avoid (Avo).

ddgcrystal.name: Ddg Crystal
ddgcrystal.desc: Material used to reinforce engage weapons. Increases dodge (Ddg).

dragonbane.name: Dragon Bane
dragonbane.desc: Material used to augment engage weapons. Adds Effective: Dragon.

riderbane.name: Rider Bane
riderbane.desc: Material used to augment engage weapons. Adds Effective: Cavalry.

armorbane.name: Armor Bane
armorbane.desc: Material used to augment engage weapons. Adds Effective: Armored.

flierbane.name: Flier Bane
flierbane.desc: Material used to augment engage weapons. Adds Effective: Flying.

corruptedbane.name: Corrupted Bane
corruptedbane.desc: Material used to augment engage weapons. Adds Effective: Corrupted.

beef.name: Beef
beef.desc: Robust red meat from a cow. Brodia exports a deluxe brand that comes with a hefty price tag.

pork.name: Pork
pork.desc: Meat from a pig. This common meat is popular due to its availability and low cost.

chicken.name: Chicken
chicken.desc: This meat is said to be an efficient source of nutrients for building muscle.

mutton.name: Mutton
mutton.desc: Sheep meat with a distinctive aroma. People either love it or hate it.

onion.name: Onion
onion.desc: A vegetable found in the Somniel garden. It doesn't do well in heat, but it thrives in cold weather.

cabbage.name: Cabbage
cabbage.desc: A vegetable found in the Somniel garden. It tastes slightly sweet when eaten raw.

herb.name: Herb
herb.desc: An aromatic culinary addition that improves taste or adds an attractive garnish.

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.desc: A popular vegetable most commonly grown in Firene, where they grow many appealing varieties.

potato.name: Potato
potato.desc: Grown in Firene, Solm, and Brodia. This vegetable eased the postwar famine a thousand years ago.

rarevegetable.name: Rare Vegetable
rarevegetable.desc: A strange vegetable said to bring good fortune. It grows in very few places, and it cannot be cultivated.

wheatflour.name: Wheat Flour
wheatflour.desc: A common kitchen staple found in all manner of foods.

apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: A fruit found in the Somniel orchard. Popular since ancient times, it also appears in various fairy tales.

orange.name: Orange
orange.desc: The most common fruit in Firene. It is a Firenese specialty and does not grow anywhere else.

peach.name: Peach
peach.desc: A soft and delicious fruit grown exclusively in the Somniel orchard. It used to be gifted to visiting royals.

grapes.name: Grapes
grapes.desc: A fruit found in the Somniel orchard. It grows in bunches, so it is often shared in groups.

berries.name: Berries
berries.desc: A small fruit that grows in many regions. It is a familiar snack for the people of Firene and Brodia.

rarefruit.name: Rare Fruit
rarefruit.desc: A fruit found in very few regions. Sometimes called "ghost fruit" as the tree dies after a single season.

nuts.name: Nuts
nuts.desc: A label used for all common tree nuts. Some are dried and some are very small.

herring.name: Herring
herring.desc: Samian herring that has been prepared for cooking.

carp.name: Carp
carp.desc: Caria carp that has been prepared for cooking.

salmon.name: Salmon
salmon.desc: Tipa salmon that has been prepared for cooking.

cod.name: Cod
cod.desc: Valcamonic cod that has been prepared for cooking.

eel.name: Eel
eel.desc: Myceen eel that has been prepared for cooking.

sardines.name: Sardines
sardines.desc: Big-eyed sardines that have been prepared for cooking.

driedfish.name: Dried Fish
driedfish.desc: A whole dried fish that has been prepared for cooking.

sashimi.name: Sashimi
sashimi.desc: Fresh fish sliced into elegant pieces.

rarefish.name: Rare Fish
rarefish.desc: Unusual fish found in the Somniel pond and prepared for cooking. It is rich in healthy nutrients.

milk.name: Milk
milk.desc: Dairy from animals such as cows, goats, and sheep.

eggs.name: Eggs
eggs.desc: A popular ingredient produced by a bird.

beans.name: Beans
beans.desc: Plant seeds used in cooking. They come in a variety of shapes and sizes.

spices.name: Spices
spices.desc: Seasoning extracted from plants. Commonly used in cooking to adjust aroma, flavor, and color.

tealeaves.name: Tea Leaves
tealeaves.desc: An artisan fills each tea bag by hand with freshly plucked leaves. Favored by fans of tea parties and cooking.

driedmeat.name: Dried Meat
driedmeat.desc: A well-aged dried meat popular as a portable snack. Favored by fans of meat and folk food.

yogurt.name: Yogurt
yogurt.desc: Made with the milk of select alpacas, one bite will transport you to green pastures. Favored by fans of dairy.

roastedyam.name: Roasted Yam
roastedyam.desc: Roasted in the open fire and made without seasoning to bring out its flavor. Favored by fans of yams.

trainingweight.name: Training Weight
trainingweight.desc: A stone weight that can be held by hand or tied to the leg. Favored by fans of training and exercise.

musclebalm.name: Muscle Balm
musclebalm.desc: Apply to muscles after working out to avoid soreness. Favored by fans of training and exercise.

animaltreats.name: Animal Treats
animaltreats.desc: A tightly sealed bottle of pungent treats that will draw all kinds of creatures. Favored by animal fans.

sharpchisel.name: Sharp Chisel
sharpchisel.desc: A tool used to carve intricate designs on wood. Favored by fans of crafting and weapons.

fairytalebook.name: Fairy-Tale Book
fairytalebook.desc: A picture book containing many short and wondrous tales. Favored by fans of reading and fairy tales.

poetrybook.name: Poetry Book
poetrybook.desc: A diverse book of poetry including submissions from the public. Favored by fans of reading and daydreaming.

philosophybook.name: Philosophy Book
philosophybook.desc: A complex introductory text for students of reason and meaning. Favored by fans of studying.

dragonscripture.name: Dragon Scripture
dragonscripture.desc: Scripture written by Divine Dragon worshippers passed down through the ages. Favored by pious believers.

elyoshistory.name: Elyos History
elyoshistory.desc: A thick book detailing the history of Elyos and its regions. Favored by fans of reading and studying.

strongperfume.name: Strong Perfume
strongperfume.desc: A small bottle of perfume made from the essence of fruit and flowers. Favored by fans of fashion.

butterflynet.name: Butterfly Net
butterflynet.desc: A light and long-handled net made especially for catching bugs. Favored by fans of animals and bugs.

sunvisor.name: Sun Visor
sunvisor.desc: The visor protects the face and neck from sunburn. Favored by fans of exercise and walks as well.

chrysanthemum.name: Chrysanthemum
chrysanthemum.desc: This popular blossom is the national flower of Lythos. Favored by Lythian fans of flowers.

lentilflower.name: Lentil Flower
lentilflower.desc: This popular blossom is the national flower of Firene. Favored by Firenese fans of flowers.

lily.name: Lily
lily.desc: This popular blossom is the national flower of Brodia. Favored by Brodian fans of flowers.

desertmarigold.name: Desert Marigold
desertmarigold.desc: This popular blossom is the national flower of Solm. Favored by Solmic fans of flowers.

lupineflower.name: Lupine Flower
lupineflower.desc: This popular blossom is the national flower of Elusia. Favored by Elusian fans of flowers.

whiteclover.name: White Clover
whiteclover.desc: Used for cooking. With luck, one can be found with four leaves. Favored by fans of cooking and herbs.

horn.name: Horn
horn.desc: A hollow animal horn that makes a loud noise. Has no holes for playing notes. Favored by fans of music.

flowerwreath.name: Flower Wreath
flowerwreath.desc: A handmade wreath often displayed on doors or walls. Favored by fans of flowers and cute things.

cuteapron.name: Cute Apron
cuteapron.desc: A charming pink apron embellished with embroidery and frills. Favored by fans of cooking and cute things.

fishingbait.name: Fishing Bait
fishingbait.desc: Bait to lure fish made with the most appetizing worms. Favored by fans of fishing.

utilityknife.name: Utility Knife
utilityknife.desc: A handy tool that includes a knife, scissors, etc. Favored by fans of crafting, weapons, and cool things.

bearcarving.name: Bear Carving
bearcarving.desc: The realistic details make this wooden ornament shine. Favored by fans of animals and cute things.

sewingkit.name: Sewing Kit
sewingkit.desc: This compact, well-organized sewing kit is handy in a pinch. Favored by fans of sewing and knitting.

sheepwool.name: Sheep Wool
sheepwool.desc: A soft ball of yarn spun from the fresh wool of young sheep. Favored by fans of sewing and knitting.

qualitykerchief.name: Quality Kerchief
qualitykerchief.desc: A fancy handkerchief made from shiny, hand-woven cloth. Favored by fans of luxury, cleaning, and fashion.

finequillpen.name: Fine Quill Pen
finequillpen.desc: A one-of-a-kind quill pen made from a rare bird's feather. Favored by fans of luxury, studying, and writing.

fancydagger.name: Fancy Dagger
fancydagger.desc: A decorative dagger with a finely wrought haft and sheath. Favored by fans of weapons.

antlerearrings.name: Antler Earrings
antlerearrings.desc: These eco-friendly earrings made from antlers shed by deer are popular in Solm. Favored by fans of fashion.

playingcards.name: Playing Cards
playingcards.desc: Picture cards used for various group games. Favored by children and fans of parties and games.

spicyseasonings.name: Spicy Seasonings
spicyseasonings.desc: Very spicy powdered red seeds that can add a kick to any dish. Favored by fans of spicy food and folk food.

landscapeart.name: Landscape Art
landscapeart.desc: A postcard depicting a beautiful landscape. There's space to write a note. Favored by fans of nature.

lovelycandle.name: Lovely Candle
lovelycandle.desc: An exclusive candle etched by hand with an elaborate design. Favored by fans of fashion, luxury, and parties.

fieldguide.name: Field Guide
fieldguide.desc: A thick encyclopedia detailing all kinds of creatures. Favored by fans of animals and bugs.

spookyscroll.name: Spooky Scroll
spookyscroll.desc: A rolled-up parchment inscribed with weird symbols to ward off spirits. Favored by fans of scary stories.

largeplate.name: Large Plate
largeplate.desc: A large and practical plate that holds food for multiple people. Favored by fans of cooking and parties.

bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.desc: Mainly used for tending wounds or bracing joints and muscles to prevent injury. Favored by fans of training.

prettypebble.name: Pretty Pebble
prettypebble.desc: A round, smooth, and pretty rock found lying on the ground.

spiritgem.name: Spirit Gem
spiritgem.desc: A gem that shines with many colors. Found only in the Somniel, especially near Sommie. Favored by all.

horsemanure.name: Horse Manure
horsemanure.desc: Ordinary horse manure. That's it. You could technically give it to someone, but why would you?

modestrod.name: Modest Rod
modestrod.desc: A simple rod suited for catching small fish. Its lack of flexibility lets you catch fish with less force.

sturdyrod.name: Sturdy Rod
sturdyrod.desc: An advanced rod suited for catching mid-sized fish. The rod bends when heavy fish bite so it will not break.

supremerod.name: Supreme Rod
supremerod.desc: A powerful rod that can handle any large fish. Small fish won't even bite. Built exclusively for master anglers.

rapiermarth.name: Rapier (Marth)
rapiermarth.desc: Sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

rapiereirika.name: Rapier (Eirika)
rapiereirika.desc: Sword wielded by Emblem Eirika. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

mercurius.name: Mercurius
mercurius.desc: Sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Doubles user's earned experience.

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.desc: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Effective: Dragon.

tyrfing.name: Tyrfing
tyrfing.desc: Sword wielded by Emblem Sigurd. Grants Res+5.

seraphim.name: Seraphim
seraphim.desc: Holy tome wielded by Emblem Celica. Effective: Corrupted.

ragnarok.name: Ragnarok
ragnarok.desc: Mighty fire tome wielded by Emblem Celica.

shine.name: Shine
shine.desc: Light tome wielded by Emblem Micaiah. Illuminates a 5-space radius (shrinks one space per turn).

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Light tome wielded by Emblem Micaiah. User recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt.

thani.name: Thani
thani.desc: Mighty light tome wielded by Emblem Micaiah. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

lancereaver.name: Lancereaver
lancereaver.desc: Unusual sword wielded by Emblem Roy. Grants advantage vs. lances but disadvantage vs. axes.

bindingblade.name: Binding Blade
bindingblade.desc: Famous sword wielded by Emblem Roy. Grants Def/Res+5. Can strike close or at range.

masterlance.name: Master Lance
masterlance.desc: Lance wielded by Emblem Leif. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. Can strike close or at range.

lightbrand.name: Light Brand
lightbrand.desc: Magical sword wielded by Emblem Leif. Grants Lck+10. Can strike close or at range.

noblerapier.name: Noble Rapier
noblerapier.desc: Sword wielded by Emblem Lucina. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

parthia.name: Parthia
parthia.desc: Bow wielded by Emblem Lucina. Doubles user's earned experience. Grants Res+5. Effective: Flying.

parallelfalchion.name: Parallel Falchion
parallelfalchion.desc: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Lucina. Effective: Dragon.

manikatti.name: Mani Katti
manikatti.desc: Divine sword wielded by Emblem Lyn. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

mulagir.name: Mulagir
mulagir.desc: Mighty bow wielded by Emblem Lyn. Grants Spd+5. Effective: Flying, Dragon.

urvan.name: Urvan
urvan.desc: Heirloom axe wielded by Emblem Ike. Grants Res+3.

ragnell.name: Ragnell
ragnell.desc: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Ike. Grants Def+5. Can strike close or at range.

aymr.name: Aymr
aymr.desc: Axe of Emblem Byleth/Edelgard. Smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat. Eff: Dragon.

blutgang.name: Blutgang
blutgang.desc: Magical sword wielded by Emblem Byleth. Effective: Dragon, Cavalry.

luin.name: Lúin
luin.desc: Lance wielded by Emblem Byleth. Raises damage based on user's Spd. Effective: Dragon.

areadbhar.name: Areadbhar
areadbhar.desc: Lance wielded by Emblem Byleth/Dimitri. If user initiates combat, grants Mt+50%.

aegisshield.name: Aegis Shield
aegisshield.desc: Shield wielded by Emblem Byleth. Grants Def+6 and Res+3. May halve damage if carried. Trigger %=Dex.

failnaught.name: Failnaught
failnaught.desc: Bow wielded by Emblem Byleth/Claude. If user initiates combat, grants Avo+20. Effective: Dragon, Flying.

thyrsus.name: Thyrsus
thyrsus.desc: Staff wielded by Emblem Byleth. Grants magic range +2. May halve damage if carried.

rafailgem.name: Rafail Gem
rafailgem.desc: Relic gem of Emblem Byleth. User is immune to Effective and critical hits. May halve damage if carried.

vajramushti.name: Vajra-Mushti
vajramushti.desc: Gauntlets wielded by Emblem Byleth. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. Uses lowest of foe's Def/Res.

swordofthecreator.name: Sword of the Creator
swordofthecreator.desc: Sword of Emblem Byleth. Raises damage with user's Mag. Can strike close or at range. Effective: Dragon

dualkatana.name: Dual Katana
dualkatana.desc: Unusual sword wielded by Emblem Corrin. Grants advantage vs. lances but disadvantage vs. axes.

wakizashi.name: Wakizashi
wakizashi.desc: Throwing sword wielded by Emblem Corrin. Can only strike at range, not close up.

yato.name: Yato
yato.desc: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Corrin.

windsword.name: Wind Sword
windsword.desc: Magical sword wielded by Emblem Eirika. Can strike close or at range. Effective: Flying.

sieglinde.name: Sieglinde
sieglinde.desc: Paired sword wielded by Emblem Eirika. Effective: Corrupted.

siegmund.name: Siegmund
siegmund.desc: Paired lance wielded by Emblem Ephraim. Effective: Corrupted.

oligoludia.name: Oligoludia
oligoludia.desc: Sword wielded by Emblem Alear. Effective: Corrupted.

dragonsfist.name: Dragon's Fist
dragonsfist.desc: Magical attack wielded by Emblem Alear. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. (Uses Mag.)

lyration.name: Lyrátion
lyration.desc: Sword of Emblem Alear. If user defeats foe in player phase, fills adjacent allies' engage meters by 1.

fogbreath.name: Fog Breath
fogbreath.desc: Strikes foes in area at half Def. Eff: Dragon. Creates fog. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

darkbreath.name: Dark Breath
darkbreath.desc: Magically strikes foes in area at half Res. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

flamebreath.name: Flame Breath
flamebreath.desc: Sets area on fire. Strikes foes at 70% damage and half Def. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

icebreath.name: Ice Breath
icebreath.desc: Strikes foes in area at half Def. Freezes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

tailsmash.name: Tail Smash
tailsmash.desc: Smash attack used by Emblem Tiki. Smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

eternalclaw.name: Eternal Claw
eternalclaw.desc: Claw attack used by Emblem Tiki. Easily inflicts fatal wounds.

bolting.name: Bolting
bolting.desc: Long-range thunder magic wielded by Emblem Soren. Cannot follow up.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.desc: Staff of Emblem Soren. Allies within 2 spaces gain "deals 50% of magic damage taken back to foe" for 1 turn

rexcalibur.name: Rexcalibur
rexcalibur.desc: Powerful wind magic wielded by Emblem Soren. Effective: Flying.

wolfbeil.name: Wolf Beil
wolfbeil.desc: Axe wielded by Emblem Hector. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

runesword.name: Runesword
runesword.desc: Magic sword of Emblem Hector. Can strike close or at range. Restore HP equal to 50% of damage dealt. Uses (Str/2) to calculate total atatck.

armads.name: Armads
armads.desc: Lightning-charged axe wielded by Emblem Hector. Grants Def+5. Effective: Dragon.

boltaxe.name: Bolt Axe
boltaxe.desc: Magic axe wielded by Emblem Camilla. Can strike close or at range.

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.desc: Magic wielded by Emblem Camilla. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

camillasaxe.name: Camilla's Axe
camillasaxe.desc: Axe wielded by Emblem Camilla. Grants Res+10 and deals extra damage = foe's Res-Def.

bitingblade.name: Biting Blade
bitingblade.desc: A sword with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

represailles.name: Représailles
represailles.desc: Battle lance that exudes an otherworldly air.

swirlance.name: Swirlance
swirlance.desc: A lance with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

revanche.name: Revanche
revanche.desc: Battle axe that exudes an otherworldly air.

lollichop.name: Lollichop
lollichop.desc: An axe with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

croissbow.name: Croissbow
croissbow.desc: A bow with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

confectioknife.name: Confectioknife
confectioknife.desc: A knife with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

tiramistorm.name: Tiramistorm
tiramistorm.desc: A tome with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

treat.name: Treat
treat.desc: A staff with a sweet scent. Recovers an ally's HP.

scrollcake.name: Scrollcake
scrollcake.desc: A martial skill scroll with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user's HP.

fellstone.name: Fell Stone
fellstone.desc: A dragonstone that holds the Fell Dragon's power. Halves foe Def/Res.

fellruinstone.name: Fell Ruinstone
fellruinstone.desc: A dragonstone that holds a Fell Dragon's power. Halves foe Def/Res. Can strike close or at range.

fellmagicstone.name: Fell Magicstone
fellmagicstone.desc: A dragonstone that holds a Fell Dragon's power. Magic attack using physical power. Halves foe Def/Res.

fellslaystone.name: Fell Slaystone
fellslaystone.desc: A dragonstone that holds a Fell Dragon's special power. Halves foe Def/Res. Effective: Cavalry.

fellweightstone.name: Fell Weightstone
fellweightstone.desc: A dragonstone that holds a Fell Dragon's special power. Halves foe Def/Res. Effective: Flying.

fellspark.name: Fell Spark
fellspark.desc: An attack using the power of a Fell dragonstone. Halves foe Def/Res.

fellarcana.name: Fell Arcana
fellarcana.desc: An attack using the power of a Fell dragonstone. Magic attack using physical power. Halves foe Def/Res.

fellbeam.name: Fell Beam
fellbeam.desc: A beam of darkness that mows down foes over wide area. Guaranteed hit. Ignores Def/Res.

devastation.name: Devastation
devastation.desc: Destroys terrain around the unit, killing friend and foe alike. Channels life force of the slain into power.

drainessence.name: Drain Essence
drainessence.desc: Instantly kills all units in the area, friend and foe alike. Channels life force of the slain into power.

standardblast.name: Standard Blast
standardblast.desc: Standard cannonball. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

magicblast.name: Magic Blast
magicblast.desc: Cannonball infused with magic. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

freezeblast.name: Freeze Blast
freezeblast.desc: Magic cannonball with a 50% chance to freeze target. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

silenceblast.name: Silence Blast
silenceblast.desc: Magic cannonball with a 50% chance to silence target. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

breakblast.name: Break Blast
breakblast.desc: Magic cannonball with 50% chance of breaking target. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

venomblast.name: Venom Blast
venomblast.desc: Magic cannonball that inflicts deadly poison on hit. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

tornadoblast.name: Tornado Blast
tornadoblast.desc: Wind magic cannonball. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets. Effective: Flying.

armorblast.name: Armor Blast
armorblast.desc: Cannonball for armored foes. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets. Effective: Armored.

riderblast.name: Rider Blast
riderblast.desc: Cannonball for cavalry foes. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets. Effective: Cavalry.

wyrmblast.name: Wyrm Blast
wyrmblast.desc: Cannonball for dragon foes. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets. Effective: Dragon.

holyblast.name: Holy Blast
holyblast.desc: Cannonball for the Corrupted. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets. Effective: Corrupted.

mightyblast.name: Mighty Blast
mightyblast.desc: High-powered cannonball. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

eldritchblast.name: Eldritch Blast
eldritchblast.desc: Cannonball infused with powerful magic. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

piercingblast.name: Piercing Blast
piercingblast.desc: Cannonball that ignores Def/Res. Cannot follow up. Reduced Hit for distant targets.

fangs.name: Fangs
fangs.desc: Sharp, cursed fangs. If user initiates combat and hits, inflicts max HP-5 on foe after combat. (Stacks to -20.)

freezingbreath.name: Freezing Breath
freezingbreath.desc: An icy breath attack. Ignores foe Def/Res. Freezes foe.

miasmabreath.name: Miasma Breath
miasmabreath.desc: Miasma breath attack. Ignores foe Def/Res. Applies miasma to foe's space.

iceball.name: Iceball
iceball.desc: A long-range ice attack. Ignores foe Def/Res. Freezes foe.

miasmaball.name: Miasma Ball
miasmaball.desc: Ranged miasma attack. Ignores foe Def/Res. Inflicts freeze and silence. Applies miasma to foe's space.

mysticsatchel.name: Mystic Satchel
mysticsatchel.desc: Expend to change user to the enchanter class.

magecannon.name: Mage Cannon
magecannon.desc: Expend to change user to the mage cannoneer class.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: Carrying this reduces cost of items by 30% when shopping at locations such as the armory or item shop.

nelsmeal.name: Nel's Meal
nelsmeal.desc: Leftovers efficiently packed by Nel. Eat to recover 20 HP.

rafalsmeal.name: Rafal's Meal
rafalsmeal.desc: Leftovers confidently packed by Rafal. Eat to recover 20 HP.

zelestiasmeal.name: Zelestia's Meal
zelestiasmeal.desc: Leftovers fondly packed by Zelestia. Eat to recover 20 HP.

gregorysmeal.name: Gregory's Meal
gregorysmeal.desc: Leftovers cautiously packed by Gregory. Eat to recover 20 HP.

madelinesmeal.name: Madeline's Meal
madelinesmeal.desc: Leftovers proudly packed by Madeline. Eat to recover 20 HP.

hlidskjalf.name: Hliðskjálf
hlidskjalf.desc: A staff wielded by Emblem Veronica. If user initiates combat, foe cannot counterattack.

fortify+.name: Fortify+
fortify+.desc: A staff wielded by Emblem Veronica. Heals HP and status effects for all allies within a 7-space radius.

elivagar.name: Élivágar
elivagar.desc: Powerful magic wielded by Emblem Veronica. Nullifies basic stat bonuses on target for 1 turn after combat.

cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
cataclysm.desc: Magic wielded by Emblem Soren. Fire, thunder, & wind attacks at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.

levinswordrobin.name: Levin Sword (Robin)
levinswordrobin.desc: Magic sword wielded by Emblem Robin. Can hit foes with magic lightning from a distance.

thoronrobin.name: Thoron (Robin)
thoronrobin.desc: Powerful lightning magic wielded by Emblem Robin.

falchionchrom.name: Falchion (Chrom)
falchionchrom.desc: A legendary sword wielded by Emblem Chrom. Effective: Dragon.
